product_name: Mountain Hardwear Nitrous Down Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The men's Mountain Hardwear Nitrous down jacket uses 800-fill down to turbocharge trips into the cold, and it's so packable that you'll choose it over your go-to fleece when in need of extra warmth. Premium 800-fill-power goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Ripstop polyester shell is downproof and incredibly light, and has a Durable Water Repellent finish to fend off light moisture. Mountain Hardwear Nitrous down jacket for men features quilted construction that keeps the down from shifting, so cold spots just don't happen. Handwarmer pockets; dual hem drawcords; jacket stows in pocket; full elastic cuffs slide easily over layers to seal in warmth. Closeout.
